episodes.title: Welcome to the Comedy Podcast! So Tragic.
episodes.summary:
BOMBSHELL IS BACK!!! That's right! Bringing the heat. We talk about life and how it can crack you with a 2x4 when you ain't looking. Titus remembers where his darkness started and it was over a dog. Bombshell talks about her grief over her Mom while totally avoiding talking about her grief over her mom. And we discover a new martial art "Iron Crotch Kung fu" 

Fight Stupid Or Stupid thinks its Right!

This is the Titus Podcast!

episodes.title: BEST OF TITUS PODCAST: A Look Back at Episode 100
episodes.summary:
Hey Guys,

Taking a break this week, but we'll be back soon!  To hold you over please enjoy the 100th Episode of the Titus Podcast, one of our favorites.

Also go visit the BRAND NEW ChristopherTitus.com where you can download all 7 comedy specials for the first time.

Enjoy!

Fight Stupid or Stupid Thinks It's Right.

episodes.title: What's the deal with Jews?
episodes.summary:
Yep, you read it right. Titus explores why the chosen people seem to be chosen in a bad way and why hate seems to be on the rise. Willy fills in and we see what Fredrick Douglas is up to. Our Douche Correspondent saves the Fetus' ass and gives him stories for the news. 

Fight stupid, or Stupid thinks it's right.

This is the Titus Podcast!

episodes.title: Oh no he did-int! Yeah, yeah he did...
episodes.summary:
Titus, Willie, and Fetus talk about the circus that was Donald Trump's surprise press conference.  How many times did he mention Clinton? Did you know Uranium is "bad stuff"? Is Russia secretly in control of our government? All these are topics that are fair game for Titus and company.  Also on the table for discussion is: Putin's many exploits, chicken statues thieves, and for once BREAKING NEWS!

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced, THIS IS THE TITUS PODCAST!

episodes.title: SHUT UP, YOU STUPID CELEBRITY!

episodes.title: Best of Titus Podcast: Welcome to Hollywood Youngsters!

YOU WANT TO BE A STAR? YOU WANT TO HAVE FORTUNE FAME AND A LEAR JET? WELL HERE IS HOW YOU DO IT! We also cover the satanic nightmare that showbusiness can be. Bombshell does her "O" face and Nerd punk walks us through the jungle of the unemployed.

episodes.title: Best of Titus Podcast: The Fatcast

After Disney takes the lead on obese little bastards and cuts junk food advertising and New York tries to outlaw "Vat O'soda". Titus and the crew go after obesity In America. Never unbiased, Always unbalanced. This is the TITUS Podcast!

episodes.title: Best of Titus Podacst: Bill and Titus' Excellent Adventure
episodes.summary: This week we're bringing you 3 Best of Episodes as Titus prepares for his deep south tour.  First up is a throwback to when Titus brought on fellow comedian Bill Burr to take on all of the world's problems.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: The Truth About Armageddon
episodes.summary:
This week on the Titus brings on a special guest...his 12 year old son Jett, who is ALSO running for president.  The young buck explains his plans for "fixing America" with some surprising conclusions.  Then Titus rips apart Trump's inauguration speech as Fetus does his best to not go into a fit of rage whilst reading it.

 

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced THIS IS THE TITUS PODCAST!

episodes.title: The New Normal
episodes.summary:
Titus rants about why "The New Normal" is really, "The New Stupid".  Bombshell rips apart Fetus' poor film history and tells us what Carrie Fish-ERs ashes are stored in.  Fetus explains why there will be Milk after Armageddon.

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced this is the TITUS PODCAST!

Stupid Has Gone Viral.This is the Titus Podcast!

This is the Titus Podcast

Titus loses his mind (What else is new?) about seven douche bags killing a zebra on safari. The crew examines what a REAL MAN is. Titus has some holes in his manly personality which he accepts, like a real man. Bombshell lets you know what her REAL MAN is. Fetus babbles.

This is the Titus Podcast.

episodes.title: Pussygate

Spoiler Alert: it's because of stupid people.  In the news Bombshell returns to tell us the most adorable penis story ever, and Fetus has uncontrollable laughter after some of Titus' more...interesting impressions.

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced. This is the TITUS PODCAST!

episodes.title: How to Piss off the Reaper
episodes.summary:
This week the Titus Podcast has YET ANOTHER guest.  Fitness guru Alvin Presto joins Titus and the Fetus to talk about how staying fit and active can extend your life.  Titus talks about how the phrase "3 more" haunts his dreams and what to do if you're nervous about starting a workout routine.  In the news Fetus awkwardly stumbles through telling stories about sex with dinosaurs, the worst con of all time, and why clowns are a major debate to America's police officers.

Never unbiased, always unbalanced...THIS IS THE TITUS PODCAST

Never unbiased, always unbalance. THIS...is the Titus Podcast.

episodes.title: Letter To The Dumb

Bombshell admits she has black friends, and Ryan tells us how "Friends" made smart people losers. Never Unbiased, and Always Unbalanced, this is the Titus Podcast.

episodes.title: Why I Should Be President

Trump, Clinton, or....Titus?  This week on the Titus podcast the Titus makes a compelling argument as to why YOU should vote for him to be the next leader of the free world!  He also recalls some of America's most influential Presidents, such as President Flim Flam.  Bombshell gives us a Latin lesson on rape, and Fetus tries not to get yelled at.

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced, This is the Titus Podcast!

episodes.title: Gene WIlder...Apologies
episodes.summary:
Titus begins the podcast by giving a heartfelt reminiscence of beloved comedian, writer and actor Gene Wilder. Then Fetus foolishly brings up the Colin Kaepernick flag debate and all hell breaks loose.  Bombshell hands Fetus his ass on a silver platter, then Titus follows suit.  Fetus does not agree with the previous sentence.  Also, there are more stupid criminals sending selfies in the news.

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced...this is the Titus Podcast

episodes.title: Best of Titus Podcast: If it Kills Us, Put a Label on it!
episodes.summary:
Back in June 2014, Titus decided to take a stand on something else that will never change.  Here's the legacy podcast description:

IF YOU HAVE ENOUGH MONEY, YOU CAN KILL AMERICANS! Titus, Bombshell and Willie go down the list of things that lobbyists have paid our politicians to green-light: food, drugs, chemicals, pollutants, cigarettes, alcohol, and whatever destroys human beings. All things our elected officials make legal, as long as there are enough zeros on the check. Cue National Anthem!

Never unbiased, always unbalanced! This is the Titus Podcast!

episodes.title: The Worst Year Ever...LIVE!
episodes.summary:
The Titus podcast makes does its FIRST EVER live performance at Flappers Comedy Club for the Burbank Comedy Special.  In front of an energetic group Titus rips apart those people who say 2016 is the worst year ever.  At least they're not being eaten alive in the streets by wild dogs.  Titus also brings on special guest and fellow comedian Jackie Flynn, who plays his ex-partner in the upcoming movie Special Unit!  Bombshell slams Fetus during the entire show, and he does his best not to turn too red.

Never unbiased and always unbalanced, this is the Titus Podcast...LIVE!

episodes.title: OPEN LETTER TO DONALD
episodes.summary: Titus sends Donald a very nice, well thought out audio letter asking which "Great America" Trump wants to take us back to. It's actually not that nice... Willie comes back out of the witness protection program to scare Fetus a little and Bombshell tells us how to hide cocaine in your foreskin. Never Unbiased and Always Unbalanced, This is the Titus Podcast

episodes.title: Best of Titus Podcast: How to Buy a Car
episodes.summary:
As Titus enjoys the sweet sweet relief of vacation the podcast must go on!  This week we're bringing back one of the Titus Podcast's all time best episodes.  Back in 2013 the description read:

"At a listeners request Titus goes through his car buying procedure and the damage it leaves in its wake. Nerd punk and Bombshell give their sane versions of how to do it. This one will make you laugh and make it so you don't get raped at the Kia dealership. How embarrassing is that?"

How much of his advice is still relevant? That's for you to decide.

Never unbiased and always unbalanced. This is the Titus podcast!

episodes.title: Here's What I'm Not And Always Won't Be

Never Unbiased and Always Unbalanced. This is the Titus Podcast

Never unbiased, Always unbalanced this is the Titus Podcast.

Christophertitus.com

Never Unbiased, Always Unbalanced, This is the Titus Podcast!
